feed.title: Category: STS | Around the Java world

entry.title: STS: Updating Maven Project". Unsupported IClasspathEntry kind=4
entry.content:
It is my first post and I treated it as warm-up. It is not very long but I wanted to finally start blogging ;).

During updating maven projects (on which I or someone has invoked command mvn eclipse:eclipse) in my STS I usually get error from the post title.

For me, belows steps help:

  1. In STS/Eclipse disable the maven nature for your project (via the right-click menu)

  2. Run mvn eclipse:clean (while your project is open in STS/eclipse) from command line

  3. Re-enable the maven nature

Done.
